Module chav1961.purelib
Package chav1961.purelib.i18n.interfaces

Interface Localizer.LocaleChangeListener

All Known Implementing Classes:
AutoBuiltForm, ContentNodeMetadataPanel, J2ColumnEditor, JBackgroundComponent, JButtonWithMeta, JCheckBoxWithMeta, JCloseableTab, JColorPairPickerWithMeta, JColorPickerWithMeta, JContentMetadataEditor, JDateFieldWithMeta, JDateSelectionDialog, JDialogContainer, JEnumFieldWithMeta, JFileContentManipulator, JFileFieldWithMeta, JFileSelectionDialog, JFileSystemChanger, JFormattedTextFieldWithMeta, JIntegerFieldWithMeta, JLocalizedOptionPane, JNumericFieldWithMeta, JORMProvidedTableModel, JPaginator, JRadioButtonWithMeta, JStateString, JTextFieldWithMeta, MarkupBuiltForm, SimpleNavigatorTree
Enclosing interface:
Localizer
Functional Interface:
This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.
@FunctionalInterface
public static interface Localizer.LocaleChangeListener

This interface describes listener to process locale changes.

Since:
0.0.2
Author:
Alexander Chernomyrdin aka chav1961

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void localeChanged​(java.util.Locale oldLocale, java.util.Locale newLocale)
    Process changing if the current locale.

  • Method Details

    • localeChanged

      void localeChanged​(java.util.Locale oldLocale, java.util.Locale newLocale) throws LocalizationException

      Process changing if the current locale. Call after any locale changing

      Parameters:
      oldLocale - old locale before changing. Can't be null
      newLocale - new locale after changing. Can't be null
      Throws:
      LocalizationException - if any localization problems were detected
